The food I eat you will sell me for money, and the water I drink, you will give me for money. Only let me march through,

I chose them out of all the tribes of Israel to be my priests, to go up to my altar, to burn incense, and to wear the ephod in my presence; and I assigned all the fire offerings of the Israelites to your father's house.
Joab then sounded the horn, and all the people came to a halt, pursuing Israel no farther and fighting no more.
When the news came to Joab, since he had sided with Adonijah, though not with Absalom, he fled to the tent of the LORD and clung to the horns of the altar.
The sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada. The sons of Shammai were Nadab and Abishur.
people of Bethel and Ai, two hundred and twenty-three;

Fear and dread of him fell upon all the inhabitants of the coastland, upon those in Sidon and Tyre, and those who dwelt in Sur and Ocina, and the inhabitants of Jamnia. Those in Azotus and Ascalon also feared him greatly.
Then he and his sons fled to the mountains, leaving behind in the city all their possessions.

Where are the gods you made for yourselves? Let them rise up! Will they save you in your time of trouble? For as numerous as your cities are your gods, O Judah! And as many as the streets of Jerusalem are the altars you have set up for Baal.
Thus you spoke through your servant Moses, the day you ordered him to write down your law in the presence of the Israelites:
But there is a God in heaven who reveals mysteries, and he has shown King Nebuchadnezzar what is to happen in the last days; this was your dream, the visions you saw as you lay in bed.
That is why the Son of Man is lord even of the sabbath.‚Äù

I send him therefore with the greater eagerness, so that, on seeing him, you may rejoice again, and I may have less anxiety.
Children of God. And now, children, remain in him, so that when he appears we may have confidence and not be put to shame by him at his coming.
just as I received authority from my Father. And to him I will give the morning star.
